attributes.action: Reduce the price of a passport to no more than £20
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For many years I have been amazed at the cost of passports in the UK. I recently checked how much it would be for our family (2 adults and 2 children) to have new passports - £236!
Firstly, how much does it cost to produce a passport?, I seriously doubt it costs more than £10, so why is an adult passport £72. Is it a profit making initiative? 
My idea is to reduce the price to a maximum of £20, so more lower income people and pensioners can also enjoy the similar holidays like other people.
Until the price is dramatically lower then I intend to not holiday abroad period. I regard these prices as utterly obscene, I can find no better description of the fees.
